about_the_game:
Utopia No.8 is a planet where your dream comes to life ٩(◦`꒳´◦)۶
Feel free to get connected with global Utokers via the audio or video chat!
You can customize your house and garden with a splash of imagination! If you have a business-master dream, be bold to build the stores, amusement parks or--whatever comes to your mind!
Utilize the collected resources to create clothes, furniture and cuisines. Your brainchildren can be sold at stores, exchanged with others or sent as gifts to your friends!
There is a stage and mic in the bar for you to make yourself heard! If a party is what you go for, let's create a thematic boardgame room now ❤
Say you are not a social person but yearns close pals, keep a PIYA then. This cute partner also backs your creativity-- it collects and produces vital Elemental Energies!
In your leisure time, step into the wild on the outskirts of the City Center and enjoy an exciting day of logging, fishing and resource-collecting!

Unlock a new lifestyle in Utopia No.8!

Unique systems


Customize your designer-toy-like self!

Thousands of look options plus various dyes equal to unlimited possibilities!

There are tons of costumes and accessories from head to toe for you. You can create your own ones if you get the design script!



Thematic audio & video chatrooms

Distance is never the hindrance for friendship in UTO8!

Hop in your interested thematic audio room!

Turn on the mic whenever and wherever you wish to.

Turn on the camera to show your OOTD.

Register an online concert for 100+ viewers since your singing deserves the stage.

If you are not a talky person, it's fantastic to meet and befriend others in mini-game rooms!


Decorate your dream house

Select a piece of land and build your adorable home.

The beautiful and detailed collections of furniture make your dream home come to life!

They are not simply decorations--their functions await your exploration!

Don't forget the garden is calling you! The flower-blooming garden is the perfect place for friends to enjoy a tea party!



PIYA-raising: your intimate pal

PIYA is the chummy companion and the reliable resource-collecting helper.

Grow your intimacy by taking care of your pal, teasing it with toys or sending it to venture out in the wild!

If you PIYA has a warrior spirit--let's go to the PIYA Arena in the City Center to have a friendly match with others!


Be Creative with The Item-crafting System

Get the scripts and materials ready! World Tree sets no limit on your crafting potentials in UTO8!

You can sprinkle your passion on the script and make your unique ideas come to life!

Special effects on items are additional blessings from World Tree—for those who utilize their talents.


Farm, Ranch, Orchard and Greenhouse

The planet welcomes pioneers to explore the undeveloped agricultural and husbandry areas!

Relax, relax, relax in the immersive pastoral atmosphere…

You can share your produce of seasons with friends and neighbors!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit-Window10
  • Processor: A compatible 64-bit processor or chip system with 2.5 GHz or more and equipped with four or more cores.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RadeonRX560Series / GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit-Window10
  • Processor: A compatible 64-bit processor or chip system with 2.9 GHz or more and equipped with six or more cores.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RadeonRX580Series / GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: "Utopia No.8" is a MMORPG with a sci-fi, cute style. Players build social circles, gather materials, raise pet PIYA, build houses or open shops, and unleash creativity to construct buildings.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, German
